title: How do People Communicate Earlier When There Is No Means Available of Communication like Telephone, internet etc? - Quora

response.answer_text: I will start from the latest to the earliest: Wireless telegraph. Wired telegraph. Sending letters by post. Sending letters via traveling relatives or travellers. Sending letters through dedicated messengers on horseback. If the distance if huge, then there would be a team of messengers like a relay team. Signal communication like drums, horns, fire, flags, banners. Egyptians used stone tablets to communicate with each other by carving on it. Greeks used pads covered with a layer of wax so that they could reuse the same pad over and over. The prehistoric humans used bones to send messages. The means of communication kept on evolving over time as people explored the earth.
Through fire , drum beats, flags etc
